messages.subject: Re:Fw: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Can't finish a sentence...... Are you
messages.msgSnippet: I loved this post! I m Mom to 6 wonderful, quirky, absolutely not *NORMAL* young people. Each one fits somewhere on the spectrum of what some call ADD/ADHD.
messages.messageBody:
I loved this post!
I'm Mom to 6 wonderful, quirky, absolutely not *NORMAL* young people. Each one fits somewhere on the spectrum of what some call ADD/ADHD. All are productive and reasonably happy people,too. I'm just thrilled that there is a space onthe web where we can go and read about others who are uninterested in how well one 'fits in', and more interested in what WE can bring to the table ( that is not otherwise provided.) Unschooling has come late for us--we did a patchwork of 'Christian" schools, public schools, and conventional HS when my older kids were small, but it came right at the best time!
Carmen


You can explore the universe looking for somebody who is more deserving of your love and affection
than you are yourself,
and you will not find that person anywhere.

Carmen
